story:
Once upon a time, in the ancient land of Iraq, there lived a young boy named Ali. Ali was a curious and adventurous child who loved exploring the vast deserts and ancient ruins that surrounded his village.

One night, as Ali lay in his bed under the twinkling stars, he suddenly heard a gentle whisper coming from outside his window. Curious, Ali got up from his bed and opened the window to see a shimmering light floating in the darkness.

The light spoke in a soft voice, "Ali, I am the spirit of the ancient Mesopotamian princess. I have come to take you on a magical journey to the lost city of Babylon."

Excited by the mysterious visitor, Ali climbed out of his window and followed the glowing light as it led him through the night sky. They soared over the moonlit desert, passing over ancient ruins and whispering date palm trees.

Finally, they arrived at the legendary city of Babylon, where Ali was greeted by friendly spirits and mythical creatures. Together, they danced under the starlit sky and listened to the enchanting tales of the city's glorious past.

As the night went on, Ali felt a sense of wonder and magic unlike anything he had ever experienced before. He knew that this was a truly special night he would never forget.

Before the first light of dawn, the spirit of the Mesopotamian princess led Ali back to his bedroom window and whispered, "Remember, Ali, the magic of our ancient land will always be with you, guiding you on all your adventures."

With a joyful heart, Ali climbed back into his bed, feeling grateful for the incredible journey he had experienced. As he drifted off to sleep, the spirit's words echoed in his mind, filling his dreams with visions of the majestic city of Babylon and the endless wonders of his homeland, Iraq. And so, Ali slept peacefully, ready to embark on many more magical adventures in the future.

The end. Goodnight, sweet child. May your dreams be filled with magic and wonder.
